subdisciplines.name: Enumerative Combinatorics
subdisciplines.description: The study of finite structures and the number of ways they can be arranged or chosen.

subdisciplines.name: Algorithmic Combinatorics
subdisciplines.description: The design and analysis of algorithms for solving combinatorial problems.

subdisciplines.name: Probabilistic Combinatorics
subdisciplines.description: The application of probabilistic methods to combinatorial problems and the study of random discrete structures.
